WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
BRAZIL-SOUTHEAST COAST.
DNC 01.
1. SURVEY OPERATIONS 29 DEC THRU 05 JAN 18 BY
   M/V OCEANIC CHAMPION TOWING 12 10000 METER LONG
   CABLES IN AREA BETWEEN
   21-54.00S 21-39.33S AND 039-15.98W 038-44.67W.
   WIDE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 4179/17.
3. CANCEL THIS MSG 06 JAN 18.
